short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distractions delay dreams. Boost your focus for free with Unlimited Focus: Website Blocker and Pomodoro Timer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever felt the pull of endless distractions while trying to focus? Dive into a world of productivity with Unlimited Focus! Wave goodbye to unwanted websites and harness the power of the Pomodoro technique. Your limitless concentration journey starts here!

Features: 
• Start right away with our predefined blocklist 
• Block any website you want 
• Block an unlimited number of websites 
• Customize the block duration 
• Use our pomodoro timer to fully focus during your study sessions 
• Fully customizable durations and unlimited sessions 

All features are completely free to use. There are no in-app purchases.
